citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30 PM on
06/14/2016.
Spoke with the licensees wife who stated Mr. Coblentz was working out of the house today.
